com.github.mrgoro.interactivedata.api.data.operations

Class Operation.Builder<F extends Operation<?,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mrgoro.interactivedata.api.data.operations.Operation.Builder<F>
  • Type Parameters:
    F - Type of the Operation
    Enclosing class:
    Operation<D extends OperationData,O extends OperationData>

    public static class Operation.Builder<F extends Operation<?,?>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for easy creating of Operations with often changing request data.

    Allows to only set the changing request data to the builder for creating the Operation object.

    Note: Performance of reflective operations is improved as calls are cached.

        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        Returns:

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when information specified are incorrect and instance cannot be built
